name: Feint Attack
description: You bring a creature close and hit it with a sucker punch. Make a melee attack on a creature, at advantage, dealing 1d10 + MOVE dark damage on a hit.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.

contest.effect: Works great if the user goes first this turn.
